name: Best TPA Performing Assistant
description: Test Progressive Assistant (TPA) is a test to develop assistant skills in programming. There are 5 areas that will be tested which are: 3D Game Programming, Desktop Programming, Web Design and Programming, Networking, and Mobile Programming. The assistant is asked to create a project that is like the original for example in Web Programming I imitate the website Airbnb with all its functionality. The assistant who has the highest score in five TPA will be the Best TPA Performing Assistant.
short_description: Test Progressive Assistant (TPA) is a test to develop assistant skills in programming.

name: Indonesian National Science Olympiad (OSN)

description: Fifth winner for Informatics in the Indonesian National Science Olympiad City level (OSK) 2017 for Senior High School.
